title: Trstín
text: Trstín is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> of <a href="Trnava%20District">Trnava District</a> in the <a href="Trnava%20region">Trnava region</a> of <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>. Located at the foothills of Little <a href="Carpathian%20Mountains">Carpathinas</a> it is an important road transport crossroad as two major roads I/61 and II/502 crosses here. <a href="Romanesque%20architecture">Romanesque</a> church from 13th century is the most worth seeing. It also has a large population of <a href="jews">jews</a>.
